title: STATIC WEBSITE
description:
I need a website with (mostly)
static content where I can share
my art.

title: DATA ENTRY
description:
We need to automate parsing some
data from an Excel document into
our database.
We would do it ourselves,
but we're busy.

title: PYTHON SCRIPT
description:
I was fired from my job and I just
want to mess up their systems.
They deserve it..

title: WEBSITE MOCKUP
description:
Our only designed is sick (long-term)
and we need to have at least basic
website template for presentation.

title: LANDING PAGE
description:
I would like to have a landing page
for my ..ehm.. cupcake business.

title: WEB DESIGN
description:
We're looking for someone to
design our school web.

title: WEB DEBUGGING
description:
We need to present our website
soon. It's finished,
but we're too exhausted to debug it.

title: SERVER FIX
description:
Something went wrong with our
servers and to be frank,
we have no idea what!

title: AUTOCAT PLUGIN
description:
We upgraded our software but
forgot that some plugins
are incompatible with some
of the newer versions.

title: KEYLOGGER
description:
I think my wife chats with her
lover on her notebook.
I just want to be sure.

title: SALES MANAGEMENT
description:
We'd like to have some program
that can connect to
our sales database.

title: SMALL ESHOP
description:
I heard that I should get
an eshop.
I don't know what that is,
but I'll pay you for it.

title: BOOKING PROGRAM
description:
We're booking a lots of flights
and we'd like to have all
that automated.

title: DATA ANALYSIS
description:
We got into our competitor's servers
and we got way too much data.
We need you to extract some
vital informations out of it.

title: WINDOWS PHONE
description:
We have a brilliant idea for
a Windows Phone App.
We just need someone to program it.

title: APP DESIGN
description:
I need someone to design
a custom app for..
ehm.. my customers.

title: WEB DESIGN
description:
We've finished the backend
of our project, but we
need someone to completely
design an interface.

title: SOCIAL NETWORK
description:
I'm willing to pay a lot of
money if you make a social
website exactly according
to my design.

title: STUDENT APP
description:
We're a team from local university
and we have some awesome ideas.
We can't pay much, but we will
spread good words.

title: ONLINE GAME
description:
We're a game development
studio and we'd like
to make a game. Unfortunately,
we're too small.
Will you help?
